scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm --filter nextjs-ssr_home dev" "pnpm --filter nextjs-ssr_products dev" "pnpm --filter nextjs-host-react-remote_remote start"
scripts.build: pnpm --filter nextjs-ssr_* build && pnpm --filter nextjs-host-react-remote_remote build
scripts.serve: concurrently "pnpm --filter nextjs-ssr_home start" "pnpm --filter nextjs-ssr_products start" "pnpm --filter nextjs-host-react-remote_remote serve"
scripts.e2e:ci: pnpm run start & sleep 10 && wait-on http-get://localhost:3001/ && wait-on http-get://localhost:3002/ && wait-on http-get://localhost:3000/ && npx cypress run --config-file ../cypress-e2e/config/cypress.config.ts --config '{"supportFile": "../cypress-e2e/support/e2e.ts"}' --spec "./e2e/*.cy.ts" --browser=chrome
